original_title: Servus Uli – Ein Leben für den FC Bayern
overview: "Servus", he said after 49 years as a leading personality at FC Bayern München. Whether as player, manager or president, he played a major role in making FC Bayern the most successful German football club ever. Now, after countless athletical and personal ups and downs, Uli Hoeneß is retiring in late 2019.
title: Servus Uli – A Life for FC Bayern
